languages.text: {n}Вы немедленно жалеете об этом решении. Каждая частица вашего тела испытывает страдание. В голове царит тупая измождающая боль, вызванная какими-то химическими препаратами. Тело покрывают глубокие порезы, нанесенные то ли для развлечения, то ли с прикладной целью. Все ваши органы вроде на месте, чего не сказать о крови — вы потеряли ее немало. И странная, скрежещущая судорога время от времени рождается в основании затылка — она не сильна, но почему-то тревожит вас больше всего.{/n}

{n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы немедленно жалеете об этом решении. Каждая частица вашего тела испытывает страдание. В голове царит тупая измождающая боль, вызванная какими-то химическими препаратами. Тело покрывают глубокие порезы, нанесенные то ли для развлечения, то ли с прикладной целью. Все ваши органы вроде на месте, чего не сказать о крови — вы потеряли ее немало. И странная, скрежещущая судорога время от времени рождается в основании затылка — она не сильна, но почему-то тревожит вас больше всего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by some kind of chemicals. The body is covered with deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister purpose. All of your organs appear to be intact, which cannot be said about the blood — you lost a lost of it. Finally, a strange gnashing cramp occasionally flares at the lower back of your head. It is not severe but for some reason is bothering you the most.{/n}

The body is covered with deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister purpose. All of your organs appear to be intact, which cannot be said about the blood — you lost a lost of it. Finally, a strange gnashing cramp occasionally flares at the lower back of your head. It is not severe but for some reason is bothering you the most.{/n}

{n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你立刻为这个决定感到后悔。你身体的每寸肌肤都在疼痛，脑子里也沉沉闷闷的，充满了由某种化学物质引起的钝痛。你的身体上布满了深深的伤口，要么是出于娱乐的目的被切开的，要么是出于更加邪恶的缘由。你所有器官似乎都完好无损，但你的血液却完全不是这么回事，你失血非常严重。不仅如此，某种古怪的疼痛，仿佛啮咬一般，偶尔会在你的头骨深处爆发。这种疼痛并不严重，但不知为何，它最令你感到不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你立刻为这个决定感到后悔。你身体的每寸肌肤都在疼痛，脑子里也沉沉闷闷的，充满了由某种化学物质引起的钝痛。你的身体上布满了深深的伤口，要么是出于娱乐的目的被切开的，要么是出于更加邪恶的缘由。你所有器官似乎都完好无损，但你的血液却完全不是这么回事，你失血非常严重。不仅如此，某种古怪的疼痛，仿佛啮咬一般，偶尔会在你的头骨深处爆发。这种疼痛并不严重，但不知为何，它最令你感到不安。{/n}

languages.text: {n}すぐに後悔した。身体の節々が痛む。なんらかの化学物質のせいで、頭には鈍く、体力を削がれるような痛みが続いている。何者かにもてあそばれたか、悪意を持って刻まれたのか、身体中に深い切り傷が残されている。内臓はすべて無事のようだが、激しく流血したのは間違いない。最後に、頭蓋骨の奥が時折何かにかじられるように痙攣する。そこまで酷くはないが、なぜかそれが一番気がかりだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}すぐに後悔した。身体の節々が痛む。なんらかの化学物質のせいで、頭には鈍く、体力を削がれるような痛みが続いている。何者かにもてあそばれたか、悪意を持って刻まれたのか、身体中に深い切り傷が残されている。内臓はすべて無事のようだが、激しく流血したのは間違いない。最後に、頭蓋骨の奥が時折何かにかじられるように痙攣する。そこまで酷くはないが、なぜかそれが一番気がかりだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te arrepientes de tu decisión de inmediato. Cada ápice de tu cuerpo agoniza. Hay un dolor sordo y debilitante en tu cabeza provocado por químicos de alguna clase. Tu cuerpo está cubierto de cortes profundos, realizados o por diversión o con intenciones perversas. Todos tus órganos parecen estar intactos, pero no puedes decir lo mismo de tu sangre: has perdido mucha. Por último, te sacude ocasionalmente un espasmo insistente en la base de tu cráneo. No es grave, pero, por algún motivo, es lo que más te preocupa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te arrepientes de tu decisión de inmediato. Cada ápice de tu cuerpo agoniza. Hay un dolor sordo y debilitante en tu cabeza provocado por químicos de alguna clase. Tu cuerpo está cubierto de cortes profundos, realizados o por diversión o con intenciones perversas. Todos tus órganos parecen estar intactos, pero no puedes decir lo mismo de tu sangre: has perdido mucha. Por último, te sacude ocasionalmente un espasmo insistente en la base de tu cráneo. No es grave, pero, por algún motivo, es lo que más te preocupa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous regrettez immédiatement votre décision. Chaque centimètre de votre corps est à la torture et une migraine d'une rare intensité, probablement provoquée par quelque produit chimique, vous empêche de réfléchir. Votre corps est couvert d'entailles profondes, mais vous ne sauriez dire si le responsable ne cherchait qu'à s'amuser ou s'il avait des intentions plus sinistres. Tous vos organes semblent intacts, mais ce n'est pas le cas de votre sang : vous en avez perdu une quantité plus qu'alarmante. Pour ne rien arranger, la base de votre crâne est régulièrement agitée par un étrange spasme. C'est une sensation relativement légère, mais pour une raison qui vous échappe, c'est elle qui vous inquiète le plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous regrettez immédiatement votre décision. Chaque centimètre de votre corps est à la torture et une migraine d'une rare intensité, probablement provoquée par quelque produit chimique, vous empêche de réfléchir. Votre corps est couvert d'entailles profondes, mais vous ne sauriez dire si le responsable ne cherchait qu'à s'amuser ou s'il avait des intentions plus sinistres. Tous vos organes semblent intacts, mais ce n'est pas le cas de votre sang : vous en avez perdu une quantité plus qu'alarmante. Pour ne rien arranger, la base de votre crâne est régulièrement agitée par un étrange spasme. C'est une sensation relativement légère, mais pour une raison qui vous échappe, c'est elle qui vous inquiète le plus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bereust diese Entscheidung sofort. Jeder Zentimeter deines Körpers leidet. In deinem Kopf tobt ein dumpfer, lähmender Schmerz, verursacht durch irgendwelche Chemikalien. Dein Körper ist voller tiefer Schnitte, zugefügt aus Spaß oder in böser Absicht. Deine Organe scheinen alle intakt zu sein, was sich von deinem Blut nicht sagen lässt – du hast sehr viel davon verloren. Und schließlich ist da noch ein nagender Krampf, der hin und wieder an deiner Schädelbasis aufflammt. Er ist nicht schlimm, aber aus irgendeinem Grund hast du wegen ihm die größten Bedenken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You immediately regret this decision. Every inch of your body is suffering. There is a dull, debilitating pain in your head caused by chemicals of some kind. Your body is covered in deep cuts, made either for fun or with sinister intent. All of your organs appear to be intact, but the same cannot be said for your blood — you have lost a great deal. Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bereust diese Entscheidung sofort. Jeder Zentimeter deines Körpers leidet. In deinem Kopf tobt ein dumpfer, lähmender Schmerz, verursacht durch irgendwelche Chemikalien. Dein Körper ist voller tiefer Schnitte, zugefügt aus Spaß oder in böser Absicht. Deine Organe scheinen alle intakt zu sein, was sich von deinem Blut nicht sagen lässt – du hast sehr viel davon verloren. Und schließlich ist da noch ein nagender Krampf, der hin und wieder an deiner Schädelbasis aufflammt. Er ist nicht schlimm, aber aus irgendeinem Grund hast du wegen ihm die größten Bedenken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu karardan anında pişman oluyorsun. Bedeninin her noktası ızdırap içinde. Başında bir çeşit bir kimyasaldan kaynaklı kör, enerji tüketen bir acı var. Bedenin eğlence amacıyla veyahut da tekinsiz sebeplerle yapılmış derin kesiklerle kaplı. Organlarının hepsi yerli yerinde gibi görünüyor ancak aynısı kanın için geçerli değil, çok kan kaybetmişsin. Son olarak kafatasının içi kemiriliyormuş gibi tuhaf bir spazm arada sırada kendini belli ediyor. Çok şiddetli değil ama nedense seni diğer acılarından daha fazla endişelendiriyor.{/n}

Finally, a strange gnawing spasm occasionally flares at the base of your skull. It is not severe but for some reason it is what concerns you most of all.{/n}
